typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{$id} as string,
		cachedHashcode as string,
		TimeStamp as string,
		Type as string,
		Description as string,
		Change as double,
		Amount as double,
		AmountWithoutVAT as double,
		ListPriceWithoutVAT as double,
		Discount as double,
		DiscountPercentage as double,
		DicountPercentageAtCarrier as double,
		DiscountedNetAmountAtCarrier as double,
		ThirdPartyRef as string,
		ThirdPartyRef2 as string,
		CurrencyCode as string,
		ArticleNumber as string,
		ProductCode as string,
		ThirdPartyRegTime as string,
		ProTeriaCustomerId as string,
		ThirdPartyInvoiceNo as string,
		PartnerAmount as double,
		PartnerAmountWithoutVAT as double,
		UsingCalcPrice as boolean,
		OurId as string,
		OurId2 as string,
		OurProductCode as string,
		ThirdPartyInvoiceDate as string,
		DiscountId as string,
		{@metadata} as ({Raven-Entity-Name} as string, {Raven-Clr-Type} as string, {@id} as string, {Last-Modified} as string, {Raven-Last-Modified} as string, {@etag} as string, {Non-Authoritative-Information} as boolean),
		Max as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		{$id},
		cachedHashcode,
		TimeStamp,
		Type,
		Description,
		Change,
		Amount,
		AmountWithoutVAT,
		ListPriceWithoutVAT,
		Discount,
		DiscountPercentage,
		DicountPercentageAtCarrier,
		DiscountedNetAmountAtCarrier,
		ThirdPartyRef,
		ThirdPartyRef2,
		CurrencyCode,
		ArticleNumber,
		ProductCode,
		ThirdPartyRegTime,
		ProTeriaCustomerId,
		ThirdPartyInvoiceNo,
		PartnerAmount,
		PartnerAmountWithoutVAT,
		UsingCalcPrice,
		OurId,
		OurId2,
		OurProductCode,
		ThirdPartyInvoiceDate,
		DiscountId,
		Max
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
